name: Ooyala
overview:
Ooyala is a leader in online video management, publishing, analytics and monetization. Its integrated suite of technologies and services give content owners the power to expand audiences, and deep insights that drive increased revenue from video. Ooyala serves hundreds of global media companies and consumer brands including Dell, ESPN, Fremantle Media, News International, Sephora, Telegraph Media Group, Vans, Whole Foods and Yahoo! Japan.

Ooyala was founded in Mountain View, California in 2007 by Bismarck Lepe, Sean Knapp, and Belsasar Lepe. Ooyala’s corporate headquarters are supported by global offices and sales reps in New York City, Los Angeles, London, France, Spain, the Middle East, Japan, Australia, Brazil and Mexico.
